statements: SELECT * FROM player_location_archives
SELECT player_id, location_id, timestamp FROM player_location_archives
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM player_location_archives
SELECT location_id, event_type FROM player_location_archives
SELECT player_id, event_type, event_description FROM player_location_archives
SELECT * FROM player_location_archives WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, location_id FROM player_location_archives WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT player_id, count(*) AS events_count FROM player_location_archives GROUP BY player_id HAVING events_count > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM player_location_archives WHERE event_type LIKE '%visit%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT player_id, event_description FROM player_location_archives WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL AND event_description <> '' LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, location, timestamp FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = '9e363475-58ac-4e06-b3d3-d3f4895bc726';
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played >= 10;
SELECT player_id, location FROM player_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(1 2)', 1000);
SELECT player_id, level, total_score FROM player_statistics ORDER BY level ASC, total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, location, timestamp FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score, level FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 100 ORDER BY total_score DESC, level ASC;
SELECT player_id, location, timestamp FROM player_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(-122.3321 47.6062)'::geography, 1000) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score, level FROM player_statistics WHERE level BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, location, timestamp FROM player_locations WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2022 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_locations;
SELECT player_id, location_x, location_y FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM player_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(games_played) AS total_games_played FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, location_x, location_y FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 5
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING MAX(score) > 50
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) AS unique_activities FROM player_activities GROUP BY player_id
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, player_id FROM player_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_timestamp
SELECT * FROM player_locations;
SELECT player_id, location_name, timestamp FROM player_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM player_profile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT location_name, region FROM game_locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score FROM game_statistics ORDER BY games_played DESC, total_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, age FROM player_profile
SELECT player_name, gender, age, games_played FROM player_profile JOIN game_statistics ON player_profile.player_id = game_statistics.player_id

SELECT player_name, location_name, region FROM player_profile JOIN player_locations ON player_profile.player_id = player_locations.player_id JOIN game_locations ON player_locations.location_id = game_locations.location_id
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_profile JOIN game_statistics ON player_profile.player_id = game_statistics.player_id WHERE total_score > 1000
SELECT player_name, location_name, timestamp FROM player_profile JOIN player_locations ON player_profile.player_id = player_locations.player_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM player_locations;
SELECT player_id, location_name FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM locations WHERE location_id > 5;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM player_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, location_id, location_name, timestamp FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, join_date FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_level ASC;
SELECT player_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM player_activities JOIN activity_types ON player_activities.activity_id = activity_types.activity_id WHERE activity_name = 'Sport';
SELECT * FROM player_locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'C%');
